TopicTitle: So many List of addons/mods are broken due to the switch to this new forum, (con..)

Articles.Content:
is there a fix, or a new masterlist?

for instance; http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/~kerbalsp/wiki/index.php?title=List_of_addons

many links on here just go to the front page of the forum.

At the moment, unless every defective link is hand-edited by a forum mod, this will persist for a while.

However it's very easy to find all the most used mods in one of 2 sections of the forums:

Either here: Plugin-Powered-Addon-Releases

or here: Addon-Releases-and-Projects-Showcase

Click through the index pages and I will bet even money you will find what you are looking for within a short time. If a plugin is 'active' and has recent posts on it, it will of course appear right at the top of the list, so making it easy to spot the main "high-traffic" plugins like PowerSats, DYJ robotics, MechJeb and the like.

hope this helps!

Joe
And hopefully enough I hope my mod/plugin database will be online
Where do I get the Muon detector though, it's not easy to find and searching for it is useless.

Ah. You need the Muon Detector detector.

Link: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/9270-0-16-Multiversal-Mechatronics-Munolith-Research-Division-1-2?highlight=muon
If your after something that was posted on the old forum, use Google Cache to see the old pages. Then pick some key words (eg. the thread title) and search for it here.
